frontMatter.summary: Join us for a fun beginner badminton night at Claremont Stadium. All are welcome!

prev.title: üè∏ Join Us at Claremont Stadium Tonight!
prev.summary: Join us at Claremont Stadium for a fun-filled evening of badminton. Open courts from 8pm to 11pm, with a special Juvenile Club Night starting at 6:30pm for ages 14+.
